attributes.action: This petition is a vote of no confidence in our PM Theresa May. .
attributes.additional_details: There was no mention of any deal. The PM should resign and a brexiteer should replace her immediately. We the electorate are unhappy with her premiership or how she has not stood by the manifesto of leave. Brexit is brexit.
attributes.background: The deal she has made with EU is contrary to the will of the people who voted on a binary issue. The question was leave or stay. The deal ia an abomination.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions which call for people to lose their jobs. This includes government Ministers.

There are already petitions about Brexit. You might like to sign one of these if it calls for something you'd like to happen:

Walk away now! We voted for a No Deal Brexit:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185

Brexit article 50 must not be withdrawn:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387
  
Leave the EU Without a deal on April 12th:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/248281 
 
Leave EU by April 12th 2019 with deal or no deal:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250967
